trans-unit.source: Specifies a physical font face that corresponds to a font file on the disk.

The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object is a low level text object that corresponds to a single face of a font family as represented by an OpenType font file, or serialized as a block of memory in a document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件是對應至單一字體的字型系列表示由 OpenType 字型檔案，或序列化為的文件中的記憶體區塊的低層級文字物件。

trans-unit.source: The correct <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> to use for a run of characters in a given logical font is normally determined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] font system and recorded in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> objects generated by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText> object and line formatting text [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 正確<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>要用於測試回合中指定的邏輯字型的字元通常由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]字型系統而且已記錄在<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>所產生的物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.FormattedText>列格式化文字和物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> provides properties and methods for:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>提供屬性和方法：

trans-unit.source: Obtaining font face common metrics, such as the ratio of ascent and descent to em size.
trans-unit.target: 取得字型通用度量，例如的高度和深度的 em 大小比例。

trans-unit.source: Obtaining metrics, outlines, and bitmaps for individual glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 取得度量、 大綱，以及個別圖像 （glyph） 的點陣圖。

trans-unit.source: Serialization in a document.
trans-unit.target: 文件中的序列化。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the type of application scenarios that illustrate the value of using the low-level control that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object provides.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單描述類型的應用程式案例，說明使用低層級的值會控制，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件提供。

trans-unit.source: A fixed format document generator may use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> to obtain a binary image of the font for embedding in a document container
trans-unit.target: 固定的格式文件產生器可能會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>為內嵌在文件容器中取得字型的二進位映像

trans-unit.source: A printer driver may use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> to obtain font glyph outlines or bitmaps, or the entire font image for sending to the printer.
trans-unit.target: 印表機驅動程式可使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>取得字型字符外框或點陣圖或整個字型映像傳送至印表機。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> viewer application may use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> to obtain metric and bitmap information.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>檢視器應用程式可能使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>取得度量和點陣圖的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
trans-unit.target: 每個字符定義指定與其他的對齊方式的標準<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>。

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines metric values for glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 下圖會定義圖像 （glyph） 字元的度量值。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements")
trans-unit.target: ![圖像度量作圖器](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "圖像度量作圖器")

trans-unit.source: Metric values of glyph characters
trans-unit.target: 度量的圖像 （glyph） 字元的值

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> class.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> class using the specified font file location.
This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`。

trans-unit.source: The constructed <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object does not use style simulations.
trans-unit.target: 建構<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件不會使用樣式模擬。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> class by specifying a font file location.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>藉由指定的字型檔案位置的類別。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the location of the font file.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations" /> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> class using the specified font file location and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations" /> value.
This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object from an OpenType font face specified by `typefaceSource` and `styleSimulations`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件所指定 OpenType 字型`typefaceSource`和`styleSimulations`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the advance heights for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key-value pairs that represents advance height information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵-值配對的圖像 （glyph） 該代表提前高度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the advance height.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />，代表提前高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A> property is used for calculating vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A>屬性用來計算垂直版面配置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to return the collection of advance heights from the glyphs in the font.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何從字型中字符傳回預告高度的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the advance widths for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represents advance width information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組的圖像 （glyph） 該代表提前寬度資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the advance width.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示遞增寬度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A> property is used for calculating horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.AdvanceHeights%2A>屬性用來計算水平配置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示基準。

trans-unit.source: The baseline value represents the distance from cell top to English baseline relative to em size.
trans-unit.target: 基準值表示相對於 em 大小英文基準從儲存格上方之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from bottom edge of the black box to the bottom end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.BottomSideBearings%2A> value is positive when the bottom edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.BottomSideBearings%2A>黑箱下的邊緣換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內時，值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.BottomSideBearings%2A> value is negative when the bottom edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.BottomSideBearings%2A>值為負數黑箱下的邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital, relative to em size, for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，指出與基準之間的距離，英文大寫字母，表示字型的 em 大小的比例的頂端。

trans-unit.source: Gets the nominal mapping of a Unicode code point to a glyph index as defined by the font 'CMAP' table.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains the mapping of a Unicode code points to glyph indices for all glyphs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含 Unicode 程式碼的對應指向圖像索引中的所有圖像<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />物件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of glyph indices to be included in the subset.
Returns the binary image of the font subset based on a specified collection of glyphs.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that represents the binary image of the font subset.
for reading the contents of the specified <paramref name="glyphs" />.
trans-unit.target: 讀取指定的內容<paramref name="glyphs" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the copyright information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent copyright information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組表示著作權資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a copyright information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為著作權資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A> property is separate from the trademark information that is access by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A>屬性是與所存取之商標資訊分開<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to return the collection of copyright information for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何傳回著作權資訊的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，包含索引鍵/值組的索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />物件，可識別文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The value is a description information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為描述資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: The description information for a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> object can include revision notes, usage recommendations, history, features, as well as other information.
trans-unit.target: 描述資訊<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件可以包含版本資訊、 使用方式建議、 歷程記錄、 功能，以及其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent designer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表設計工具的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a designer information string.
trans-unit.target: 值為設計工具資訊字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer URL information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent designer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表設計工具的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that references a designer URL.
trans-unit.target: 值會參考設計工具的字串 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset value from the horizontal Western baseline to the bottom of the glyph black box for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent offsets for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組，代表圖像 （glyph） 的位移。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the offset value.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示位移的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font embedding permission for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingRight" /> values that represents the font embedding permission
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingRight" />值，表示字型內嵌權限

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> and is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface> objects are considered equal if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.StyleSimulations%2A> properties are equal.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface>物件會被視為相等，如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.StyleSimulations%2A>屬性是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Gets the face name for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent face name information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> 物件，其中包含代表字型名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string containing the face name.
trans-unit.target: 此值是包含字型名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the font file does not provide a name for the specified language, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.FaceNames%2A> property returns the face name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型檔案未提供的名稱指定的語言<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.FaceNames%2A>屬性會傳回英文版的字樣名稱。

trans-unit.source: The face name may identify weight, style, and/or stretch information.
trans-unit.target: 字體名稱可能會識別粗細、 樣式，及/或自動縮放資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the family name for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent family name information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表系列名稱資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string containing the family name.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，包含該系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the font file does not provide a family name for the specified language, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.FamilyNames%2A> property returns the family name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型檔案指定的語言不提供系列名稱<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.FamilyNames%2A>屬性會傳回英文版的系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The family name excludes weight, style, and stretch information.
trans-unit.target: 系列名稱不會包含粗細，樣式和自動縮放資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]如<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />物件。

trans-unit.source: for getting the original [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得原始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />。

trans-unit.source: The original [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] may reveal local file system information.
trans-unit.target: 原始[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]可能顯示本機檔案系統資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the font file stream represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> value that represents the font file.
The index of the glyph to get the outline for.
The font size in drawing surface units.
The size to hint for in points.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> value describing the path for a single glyph in the font.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> value that represents the path of the glyph.
The path represents the glyph without grid fitting applied for rendering at a specific resolution.
trans-unit.target: 路徑所表示沒有套用指定的解析度轉譯格線調整圖像。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
A hash code for the current object.
Gets the number of glyphs for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
The total number of glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 字符總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the character cell relative to the em size.
An <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the height of the character cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />表示字元儲存格的高度值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the leading end of the advance vector to the left edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information for the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表圖像的距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.LeftSideBearings%2A> value is positive when the left edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.LeftSideBearings%2A>黑箱左邊的緣時換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內，值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.LeftSideBearings%2A> value is negative when the left edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.LeftSideBearings%2A>值為負數黑箱左邊的緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font license description information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs font license information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組字型的授權資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the font license information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述字型的授權資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font manufacturer information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs for the font manufacturer information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />字型製造廠商資訊的物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the font manufacturer information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述字型的製造商資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the right edge of the black box to the right end of the advance vector for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.RightSideBearings%2A> value is positive when the trailing edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance width and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.RightSideBearings%2A>黑箱尾端邊緣換頁寬和字型儲存格高度所定義的對齊矩形內時，值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.RightSideBearings%2A> value is negative when the right edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.RightSideBearings%2A>值為負數黑箱右邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sample text information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs sample text information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組範例文字資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that describes the sample text information.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，描述的範例文字資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.SampleTexts%2A> value can be the font name, or any other text that the designer thinks is the best sample to display the font in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.SampleTexts%2A>值可以是字型名稱或設計工具可讓您認為最佳範例會顯示該字型中的任何其他文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> value that represents the font stretch.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" />表示字型縮放值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the strikethrough position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，代表刪除線的位置。

trans-unit.source: The strikethrough position value is usually positive because the strikethrough is generally above the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 刪除線的位置值是通常是正數的因為刪除線通常高於基準。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the strikethrough relative to the font em size.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，指出刪除線的粗細，以字型 em 大小的一部分來表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> value that represents the style value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> 值，表示樣式值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations" /> values that represents the style simulation for the font.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StyleSimulations" />值，表示字型樣式模擬。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> font conforms to Unicode encoding.
<see langword="true" /> if the font conforms to Unicode encoding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果字型符合 Unicode 編碼方式。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The font may be considered as a simple collection of symbols indexed by a code point.
trans-unit.target: 字型可能會被視為符號的字碼指標以編製索引的簡單集合。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit" />.
Gets the distance from the top end of the vertical advance vector to the top edge of the black box for the glyphs represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent distance information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表距離資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> that identifies the glyph index.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是<see cref="T:System.UInt16" />可識別圖像索引。

trans-unit.source: The value is a <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance.
trans-unit.target: 值是<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.TopSideBearings%2A> value is positive when the top edge of the black box is within the alignment rectangle defined by the advance height and font cell height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.TopSideBearings%2A>黑色方塊的上邊緣的預告高度和字型儲存格高度來定義對齊矩形內時，值為正數。

trans-unit.source: The font cell height is a horizontal dimension in vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: 字型儲存格高度中垂直版面配置是水平維度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.TopSideBearings%2A> value is negative when the top edge of the black box overhangs the alignment rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.TopSideBearings%2A>值為負數黑色方塊的上邊緣 overhangs 對齊矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the trademark notice information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent trademark notice information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值組代表商標通知資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that the trademark notice information.
trans-unit.target: 值是表示商標注意事項資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A> property is separate from the copyright information that is access by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Trademarks%2A>屬性是與所存取之著作權資訊分開<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Copyrights%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the underline in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the position of the underline.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />值，表示底線的位置。

trans-unit.source: The underline position is relative to the baseline and relative to the em size.
trans-unit.target: 底線位置是相對於基準和相對於 em 大小。

trans-unit.source: The returned position value is usually negative because an underline is usually below the baseline.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的位置值是通常是負的因為底線通常是低於基準。

trans-unit.source: Gets the thickness of the underline relative to em size.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vendor URL information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent vendor URL information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表供應商的 URL 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that references a vendor URL.
trans-unit.target: 值為參考供應商的 URL 的字串。

trans-unit.source: A font vendor could embed a unique serial number in the URL, which could then be used to register the font.
trans-unit.target: 字型廠商可以將唯一的序號內嵌在 URL 中，然後可以用來登錄該字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font face version interpreted from the font's 'NAME' table.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the version.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />代表版本的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version string information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object interpreted from the font's 'NAME' table.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent version string information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含索引鍵/值配對，代表版本字串資訊。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the version.
trans-unit.target: 值為字串，代表版本。

trans-unit.source: Version strings vary significantly in format.
trans-unit.target: 版本字串會大大地改變格式。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the version as a numeric value, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Version%2A>—do not attempt to parse the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.VersionStrings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得以數值形式的版本，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Version%2A>— 請勿嘗試將值的剖析<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.VersionStrings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designed weight of the font represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> that represents the font weight.
trans-unit.target: 型別的值<see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" />表示字型粗細。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Win32 face name for the font represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 face name information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含代表 Win32 字體名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the Win32 face name.
trans-unit.target: 值為表示 Win32 字體名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the font does not provide a name for the specified language, it returns the face name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型未提供指定之語言的名稱，它會傳回英文版的字樣名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Win32 face name may identify weights (other than regular or bold), and/or style, but may not identify stretch or other weights.
trans-unit.target: Win32 字體名稱可識別加權 （而不是一般或粗體顯示），及/或樣式，但是不會識別 stretch 或是其他的加權。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Win32 family name for the font represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> object that contains key/value pairs that represent Win32 family name information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" />物件，其中包含代表 Win32 系列名稱資訊的索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The key is a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that identifies the culture.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵是可識別文化特性的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is a string that represents the Win32 family name.
trans-unit.target: 值為表示 Win32 系列名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the font does not provide a family name for the specified language, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Win32FamilyNames%2A> property returns the family name in English.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型不提供指定的語言輸入姓氏<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface.Win32FamilyNames%2A>屬性會傳回英文版的系列名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Win32 family name excludes regular or bold weights and style, but it includes other weights and stretch.
trans-unit.target: Win32 系列名稱排除規則或粗體加權和樣式，但包含其他的粗細和自動縮放。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Western x-height relative to em size for the font represented by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> object.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 的值。
